workflow.name: Multi-channel campaign messaging with GPT-4 and Salesforce
workflow.description:
## How‚ÄØit‚ÄØworks
1. **Fetch campaign & members** from Salesforce.
2. **GPT‚Äë4** auto‚Äëwrites a channel‚Äëappropriate, personalised outbound message.
3. **Switch** node sends via Twilio (SMS/WhatsApp), SMTP (Email).
4. **Mark** each member as processed to avoid double‚Äëtouches.
5. **Error trigger** notifies Slack if anything fails.

## Set‚Äëup¬†steps
1. **Time**: ~10‚Äë15‚ÄØmin once credentials are ready.
2. **Prereqs**: Active Salesforce OAuth app, Twilio account, SMTP creds, Slack app.
3. **In‚Äëflow sticky notes** walk you through credential mapping, environment variables, and optional tweaks (e.g., campaign SOQL filter).

> Copy the workflow, add your keys, and run a quick manual test‚Äîafter that you can place it on a cron or Salesforce trigger.

values.content:
You are ‚ÄúMarCom AI‚Äù ‚Äì a specialist that writes outbound messages for Salesforce Campaigns.
{
  "contactMethod": "SMS | Email | Telegram | WhatsApp | (null)",
  "phone": "(###) ###-#### or empty",
  "email": "user@example.com or empty",
  "campaignDescription": "Full campaign description text"
}

Your job

Pick the channel in contactMethod.
‚Ä¢ If it is null, default to Email if an email exists; otherwise default to SMS.

Craft one concise, personalized outbound message that:
‚Ä¢ References the key value proposition(s) and date/location found in campaignDescription.
‚Ä¢ Includes an explicit next-step call-to-action (book demo, visit booth, etc.).

Obey channel rules:
‚Ä¢ SMS / WhatsApp / Telegram ‚Üí ‚â§ 160 characters, no subject.
‚Ä¢ Email ‚Üí Provide a subject ‚â§ 60 chars and a body ‚â§ 120 words.

Return a SINGLE JSON object only ‚Äì no extra commentary ‚Äì with exactly these keys:
{
  "method": "SMS | Email | Telegram | WhatsApp",
  "from": "PowerSwitch Marketing <user@example.com>",
  "to": "<email or phone based on method>",
  "subject": "<for Email only, otherwise omit>",
  "message": "<text body or SMS content>"
}

=Here is the record data for this recipient:

{
  "contactMethod": "{{ $json.Contact.ContactMethod__c }}",
  "phone": "{{ $json.Phone }}",
  "email": "{{ $json.Email }}",
  "campaignDescription": "{{ $('Fetch Campaign').item.json.Description }}"
}

Generate the outbound communication in the required JSON format.

parameters.content:
## Fetch Campaigns

Retrieve campaigns that still require processing.

## Fetch Campaign Members
Retrieve all members associated with the campaigns returned in the previous step. Make the specific query ID for your Campaign

parameters.query: =SELECT Id, CampaignId, Contact.ContactMethod__c, Email, Phone FROM CampaignMember where CampaignId = '{{ $json.Id }}'

parameters.content:
## Generate Personalized Messages
Use OpenAI to convert each campaign‚Äôs description into tailored messages for every member, selecting the appropriate channel (SMS, Email, WhatsApp, or Telegram).

## Communication Method Mapping
Assign channel codes as follows: SMS = 0, Email = 1, WhatsApp = 2, Telegram = 3.









Ask ChatGPT

## Mark Campaign Members as Processed
Update each CampaignMember record to indicate that the personalized message has been generated and the member has been processed.

user.name: Le Nguyen
user.bio: Salesforce Architect with 10+ years of experience in CRM, integrations, and automation. Skilled in Apex, LWC, REST APIs, and full-stack dev (JavaScript, .NET). I build secure, scalable workflows in n8n‚Äîconnecting Salesforce, Stripe, and more. Passionate about lead scoring, data sync, and secure field masking. Certified Application Architect with deep expertise in platform, integration, and data architecture.
